Package com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client

This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientStart
    This Class is the used to connect to an launched ServerStart.
    InvocationHandlerProducer
    This interface is like a Factory, for creating a JavaRemoteInformationInvocationHandler.
    RemoteObjectAccess
    This interface provides a way of getting RemoteObjects.
    RemoteObjectFactory
    Implementations will create RemoteObjects.
    RemoteObjectHandler
    This interface says that the Object implementing it handles RemoteObject requests.
    Sender
    This interface is the bridge between Server and Client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JavaInvocationHandlerProducer
    This InvocationHandlerProducer produces JavaRemoteInformationInvocationHandler.
    JavaRemoteInformationInvocationHandler<T>
    This is the proxy, which is used for the RMI API.
    RemoteAccessBlockRegistration
    This Class contains information about requests to the Server.

Package com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.client Description

This package contains all the relevant classes for the Client.

Any class contained within this package, that is not an interface may be subject to change.

All interfaces that are relevant for use, have some sort of method, that allows you to create any instance. Do not try to cast anything to any potential implementation. Most of the classes are package-private and that is by default.
